text: Ara tadera kache yakhana amadera suspasta ayatasamuha tila'oyata kara haya takhana tara bale, 'tomadera purbapurusa yara'ibadata karata e byakti'i to tara ibadate tomaderake badha dite caya.' Tara ara'o bale, 'eta to mithya udbhabana chara ara kichu'i nayaâ€™. Ara kaphiradera kache yakhana satya ase takhana tara bale, 'e to eka suspasta jadu
